question: If the Runner encounters [Mestnichestvo](https://netrunnerdb.com/en/card/33053) with 1 hosted advancement counter, which is spent to make the Runner lose 3, will [Weyland Consortium: Builder of Nations](https://netrunnerdb.com/en/card/11038) trigger at the end of the encounter?
answer: No. The ability on [Weyland Consortium: Builder of Nations](https://netrunnerdb.com/en/card/11038) triggers when an encounter with an advanced piece of ice ends. The game checks if the ice is advanced at the end of the encounter.
